title: Digital Collaboration Learning Design Strategies for Electronic Environment Utilization

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Digital Tool Proficiency and Understanding of Social Interactions
context.additional_context: Focus on designing and implementing collaborative learning activities in smartphone-centric, resource-constrained technological environments

learning_goals: Learners can design three or more collaborative activity scenarios using learning design tools such as LAMS.
Learners can design blended learning flows that combine individual and group learning activities in digital environments.
Learners can facilitate discussion activities on social topics using digital collaboration tools (e.g., Padlet, Google Jamboard) accessible via smartphones.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
